title: Примарна спадщина
overview: An amazing journey of personal growth, in which sincere humor is intertwined with a realistic depiction of the afterlife. This is the transformation of the main character Viktor, a cynical and selfish person who, after the death of his grandmother, finds himself thrown into the spirit world. Through humorous situations, the audience will witness the transformation of a "sloppy scoundrel" into a kind-hearted and selfless person.
